sql-case.value: SELECT * FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = 1
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM t_order GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id DESC
SELECT * FROM t_order LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM t_order LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT * FROM t_order o JOIN t_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id
SELECT * FROM t_order o RIGHT JOIN t_item i ON o.order_id = i.order_id
SELECT * FROM t1 CROSS JOIN t2
SELECT * FROM t1 UNION SELECT * FROM t2
SELECT * FROM t1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM t2
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM t_order
SELECT user_id, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY city ORDER BY salary DESC) FROM t_employee
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM t_order) t
SELECT SUBSTRING('abc', 1, 2)
SELECT TRIM(BOTH ' ' FROM ' a ')
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM '2023-01-01')
SELECT db1.t_order.* FROM db1.t_order
SELECT * FROM t_logic WHERE a XOR b
SELECT * FROM t_pred WHERE col IN (1,2)
SELECT * FROM t_pred WHERE col = ALL (SELECT 2)
SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY 1, price + 1 DESC LIMIT 1 OFFSET 1
SELECT CASE WHEN a > 1 THEN b ELSE c END, @var, @@global.var FROM t_case
SELECT * FROM t1 JOIN t2 USING (id), t3
SELECT DATE '2024-01-01', 0x1F, B'101' FROM DUAL
SELECT analytics.fn(col) FROM t_func_owner
SELECT * FROM t_pred WHERE a <=> b
SELECT * FROM t_pred WHERE col SOUNDS LIKE 'abc'
SELECT INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT 'a' COLLATE utf8
SELECT BINARY 'a'
SELECT db1.tbl1.col1 FROM db1.tbl1
SELECT SUBSTR('abc',1,2)
SELECT TRIM(LEADING 'x' FROM 'xxx')
SELECT TRIM(TRAILING 'y' FROM 'yyy')
SELECT CURRENT_TIME(3)
SELECT * FROM t1 NATURAL JOIN t2
SELECT * FROM t_doc WHERE MATCH(title) AGAINST('hive')
